name: Unstable Rocket Advance
description:
This rocket is extremely unstable just cannot go straight! Try to balance the rocket as long as possible and be careful not to crash!

This is a super simple demake of the Ludum Dare 49 project Unstable Rocket.

The rocket will randomly move up, down, or straight at random intervals, use the up and down buttons to avoid the enemies.

Developed in C++ with the Butano engine

Source code

Background image from Deep-Fold's Pixel Space Background Generator

Music and sound from zapsplat.com
